title: Remdesivir Market Analysis
content: Remdesivir has shown significant efficacy in treating COVID-19. Market potential estimated at $2.5B globally. Key competitors include Gilead's own portfolio.

title: Pembrolizumab Competitive Intelligence
content: Merck's Keytruda dominates the PD-1 inhibitor market. Patent expires in 2030. Opportunities in combination therapies.

title: Insulin Market Trends
content: Diabetes prevalence increasing. Biosimilars entering market. Focus on long-acting insulins for better patient compliance.

title: Aspirin Patent Landscape
content: Generic aspirin widely available. New formulations for cardiovascular prevention showing promise.

title: Morphine Regulatory Update
content: Morphine remains a key opioid for severe pain management. Regulatory scrutiny increasing due to addiction concerns. Market stable at $3.2B with controlled distribution.

title: Bivalirudin Anticoagulation Study
content: Bivalirudin shows advantages over heparin in PCI procedures. Lower bleeding risk. Market growing at 6.8% annually. Patent protection until 2010.
